sentences.en: a space capsule orbiting the Earth
sentences.cn: 沿地球轨道飞行的太空舱

sentences.en: Each capsule contains between 30 and 100 pellets of morphine sulphate according to the strength of dose required.
sentences.cn: 根据所需剂量的浓度不同，每颗胶囊里含有30至100个吗啡硫酸盐颗粒。

sentences.en: He broke the capsule with his tongs.
sentences.cn: 他用方糖夹钳砸碎了小玻璃容器.

sentences.en: He repeated his chief demands in capsule.
sentences.cn: 他概要地重复了他的主要要求.

sentences.en: The astronauts work and live in the space capsule.
sentences.cn: 宇航员在航天舱里工作生活.

sentences.en: The capsule gets very hot on re - entry.
sentences.cn: 航天舱在重返大气层时产生高热.

sentences.en: The convexity of the seed capsule is of decisive importance in host selection.
sentences.cn: 种子囊的突起对寄主的选择起着决定性的作用.

sentences.en: The doctor advised me to take a capsule this morning.
sentences.cn: 医生建议我今天早晨服一粒胶囊.

sentences.en: The following are some of the theories in capsule form.
sentences.cn: 下面是某些理论的主要论点.

sentences.en: The globular seed capsule contains numerous small seeds.
sentences.cn: 这种球形种子荚里含有大量的小种子。

sentences.en: The plastic capsule was transparent all the way round.
sentences.cn: 那个塑料小盒通体透明.

sentences.en: The police say he swallowed a cyanide capsule to avoid arrest.
sentences.cn: 警察说他为了逃避逮捕就吞了一颗氰化物胶囊。

sentences.en: The virulent strains had a polysaccharide capsule and formed smooth colonies on agar medium.
sentences.cn: 有毒菌株具有多糖荚膜它在琼脂培养基上形成光滑的菌落.

sentences.en: This is a capsule description of the event.
sentences.cn: 这就是关于那个事件的简要介绍.

sentences.en: You are asked to swallow a capsule containing vitamin B.
sentences.cn: 你要服一粒维生素B胶囊。

sentences.en: You can also take red ginseng in convenient tablet or capsule form.
sentences.cn: 你也可以选择便于服用的红参片或红参胶囊。

words.tran_cn: 胶囊包裹的，包于胶囊内的；有蒴的，[植] 包于蒴内的
有蒴的；胶囊包裹的（等于capsulate）
[药]胶囊；[植]蒴果；太空舱；小容器

phrases.tran_cn: [口语]概括地说，简单扼要地讲

trans.tran_cn: 胶囊，航天舱，（植物的）荚，密封小容器
trans.tran_en: a plastic container shaped like a very small tube with medicine inside that you swallow whole
